meteringrange: 0 to 20 EV: 3D Color Matrix, Center-Weighted Metering or highlight weighted metering / Spot Metering
interfacelanguages: Arabic, Bengali, Brazilian Portuguese, Bulgarian, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Marathi, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Spanish, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
flashsyncspeed: Up to 1/250 sec. Synchronizes with shutter at 1/320s or slower (flash range drops at speeds between 1/250 and 1/320s)
whitebalancebracketing: 2 to 9 exposures in increments of 1, 2 or 3 EV
recordingmedia: 1x SD, SDHC & SDXC slot 1x CompactFlash© (CF) Type I slot (compliant with UDMA)
picturecontrol: Flat Landscape Monochrome Neutral Portrait Standard User-customizable Settings Vivid
activedlighting: Auto Extra High High Normal Low Off
incameraimageediting: Color Balance, Color Outline, Color Sketch, D-Lighting, Distortion Control, Edit Movie, Filter Effects, Fisheye, Image Overlay, Miniature Effect, Monochrome, NEF (RAW) Processing, Perspective Control, Quick Retouch, Red-Eye Correction, Resize, Selective Color, Side-by-Side Comparison, Straighten, Trim
dustreduction: Image Sensor Cleaning Dust-Off Reference Photo Image Dust Off reference data (optional Capture NX 2 software required)
continuousshooting: FX-format CH: Up to 5 frames per second CL: Up to 1-5 frames per second 5:4 format DX-format CH: Up to 5 frames per second CL: Up to 1-5 frames per second CH: Up to 6 frames per second 7 fps in DX-crop mode when using optional MB-D12 battery pack and EN-EL18a battery CL: Up to 1-6 frames per second 1:2 format CH: Up to 6 frames per second CL: Up to 1-6 frames per second
playbackfunctions: Auto Image Rotation, Full-Frame and Thumbnail (4, 9, or 72 images or calendar), Highlights, Histogram Display, Image Comment, Movie Playback, Movie Slideshow, Playback with Zoom, Slideshow
stillimageformat: JPEG: JPEG-Baseline Compliant; can be selected from Size Priority and Optimal Quality JPEG: JPEG-Baseline Compliant with fine (~ 1:4), Normal (~ 1:8) or Basic (~ 1:16) Compression NEF (RAW): 12 or 14 bit, lossless compressed, compressed, or uncompressed; small size available (12-bit uncompressed only) TIFF (RGB) NEF (RAW) + JPEG: Single Photograph Recorded in both NEF (RAW) and JPEG Formats
moviemaximumrecordingtime: Highest Quality: 20 minutes Normal Quality: 29 minutes 59 seconds
afworkingrange: EV -2 to 19 at 20° C (68° F)   ISO 100
selftimer: 2, 5, 10, 20 sec.; 1 to 9 exposures at intervals of 0.5, 1, 2, or 3 sec. (Timer duration electronically controlled)
meteringmodes: Center-weighted: Weight of 75% given to 12 mm circle in center of frame Matrix: 3D Color Matrix Metering III (type G, E, and D lenses); Color Matrix Metering III (other CPU lenses); Color Matrix Metering available with non-CPU lenses if user provides lens data Spot: Meters 4 mm circle (about 1.5% of frame) centered on selected focus point Highlight-weighted: Available with type G, E, and D lenses; equivalent to center-weighted when non-CPU lens is used
afpoints: 9, 21 or 51 point Dynamic-area AF Auto-area AF Single-point AF 3D-tracking (51 points) Group-area AF
gps: Supports optional GP-1 & GP-1A GPU units
flashexposurecompensation: -3 to +1 EV in increments of 1/3, 1/2 or 1 EV
brightnesscontrol: Brightness, 5 levels Brightness control uses ambient brightness sensor
flashsync: Auto FP High-Speed Sync supported Front-curtain sync (normal) Rear-curtain sync Red-Eye reduction Red-Eye reduction with slow sync Slow rear-curtain sync Slow sync Off
fileformat: H.264 / MPEG-4 Advanced Video Coding Audio: Linear PCM (Stereo)
shutterrelease: Continuous low-speed [CL] mode Continuous high-speed [CH] mode Mirror-up [Mup] mode Quiet Shutter Release Quiet Continuous Release Self-timer Mode Single-frame [S] mode
recordingformats: Compliant with DCF (Design Rule for Camera File System) 2.0 DPOF (Digital Print Order Format) PictBridge EXIF 2.3 (Exchangeable Image File Format for Digital Still Cameras)
flashcontrol: TTL: i-TTL flash control using 91,000-pixel RGB sensor are available with built-in flash and SB-910, SB-900, SB-800, SB-700, SB-600, SB-400, or SB-300; i-TTL balanced fill-flash for digital SLR is used with matrix and center-weighting metering, standard i-TTL flash for digital SLR with spot metering
moviemetering: TTL exposure metering using main image sensor
movieaudio: Built-in Stereo Microphone Optional: External Stereo Microphone
exposurecompensation: ±5 EV in increments of 1/3, 1/2 or 1 EV
type: Wide Viewing Angle TFT-LCD w/ 170° wide-viewing angle
dlightingbracketing: 2 frames using selected value for one frame 3–5 frames using preset values for all frames
settings: Auto (2 types) Choose color temperature (2500K–10000K) Cloudy Direct Sunlight Flash Fluorescent (7 types) Incandescent Preset manual (Stores up to 6 values, spot white balance measurement available during live view) Shade
focusingmodes: Autofocus (AF): Single-servo AF (AF-S); Continuous-servo AF (AF-C); predictive focus tracking activated automatically according to subject status Manual focus (MF): Electronic rangefinder can be used
